languages.text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.
languages.original_text: Цель получает (от {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} до {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) урона и эффект варп-горения. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} составляет {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%. Псайкер может двигаться после применения Воспламенения. Варп-горение: наносит цели {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} урона в конце ее хода. Пробитие брони составляет {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}.

traits.locale_text: The target suffers (from 1 to Psyker's WP bonus)+2×(psy rating) damage and gains the Warp Burn effect. This attack has 5×(psy rating)% armour penetration. Warp Burn: Deals (Psyker's WP bonus)/2+(psy rating) damage to the target at the end of their turn, with 5×(psy rating)% armour penetration. The target creature must make an Agility test with a −5×(Psyker's psy rating) penalty to stop burning.

The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and gains the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move freely after using Ignite despite it being an attack. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn, with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

Псайкер может двигаться после применения Воспламенения. Варп-горение: наносит цели {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} урона в конце ее хода. Пробитие брони составляет {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Цель получает ((от 1 до {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} ВОЛ псайкера) + 2 × пси-рейтинг) урона и эффект варп-горения. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Варп-горение: Наносит цели (бонус ВОЛ псайкера / 2 + пси-рейтинг) урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(5 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Цель получает ((от 1 до {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g} ВОЛ псайкера) + 2 × пси-рейтинг) урона и эффект варп-горения. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Варп-горение: Наносит цели (бонус ВОЛ псайкера / 2 + пси-рейтинг) урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет (5 × пси-рейтинг)%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −(5 × пси-рейтинг псайкера).

Цель получает {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} урона и эффект варп-горения. Пробитие брони составляет {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%. Варп-горение: Наносит цели {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} урона в конце ее {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. Пробитие брони составляет {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%. Для снятия эффекта цели требуется пройти проверку Ловкости со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}.

languages.text: 目标受到（{uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}到{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}）点伤害，并获得“亚空间烧灼”效果。此次攻击附带{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。灵能者可在使用星火燎原之后进行移动。 亚空间烧灼：目标的回合结束时，受到{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}点伤害，此伤害附带{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%护甲穿透效果。目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}减值，只有检定成功才能灭火。
languages.original_text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: 目标受到（{uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}到{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}）点伤害，并获得“亚空间烧灼”效果。此次攻击附带{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。灵能者可在使用星火燎原之后进行移动。 亚空间烧灼：目标的回合结束时，受到{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}点伤害，此伤害附带{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲穿透{/g}效果。目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中额外承受-{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}减值，{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}只有检定成功才能灭火。

目标受到{uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}点伤害，并获得“亚空间烧灼”效果。此次攻击附带{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}效果。 亚空间烧灼： 目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，受到{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}点伤害，此伤害附带{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%护甲穿透效果。此外，目标生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，只有检定成功才能灭火。此次检定结果会额外承受{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}点{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: El objetivo sufre (de {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} a {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) de daño y recibe el efecto quemadura de disformidad. Este ataque posee un {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}de penetración de armadura{/g}. El psíquico puede moverse después de usar Ignición. Quemadura de la disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} de daño al objetivo al final de su turno, con un {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de penetración de armadura. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} para dejar de arder.
languages.original_text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo sufre (de {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} a {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) de daño y recibe el efecto quemadura de disformidad. Este ataque posee un {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}de penetración de armadura{/g}. El psíquico puede moverse después de usar Ignición. Quemadura de disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} de daño al objetivo al final de su turno, con un {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de penetración de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} para dejar de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arder{/g}.

El objetivo sufre {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} de daño y gana el efecto quemadura de la disformidad. Este ataque posee un {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g}. Quemadura de la disformidad: Inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} de daño al objetivo al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, con un {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de penetración de armadura. La criatura objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} para dejar de arder.

languages.text: Das Ziel erleidet (zwischen {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} und {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) Schaden und wird mit Warp-Brand belegt. Dieser Angriff hat {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Der Psioniker kann sich bewegen, nachdem er Entzünden eingesetzt hat. Warp-Brand: fügt dem Ziel am Ende seines Zugs {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% Rüstungsdurchdringung. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Malus von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} bestehen, damit der Brand endet.
languages.original_text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erleidet (zwischen {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} und {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) Schaden und wird mit Warp-Brand belegt. Dieser Angriff hat {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Der Psioniker kann sich bewegen, nachdem er Entzünden eingesetzt hat. Warp-Brand: fügt dem Ziel am Ende seines Zugs {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Malus von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} bestehen, damit der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brand{/g} endet.

Das Ziel erleidet {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} Schaden und erhält den Effekt Warpbrand. Dieser Angriff hat {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Warpbrand: Fügt dem Ziel am Ende seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% Rüstungsdurchdringung. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeits-{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} bestehen, damit der Brand endet.

Das Ziel erleidet (zwischen {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} und {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) Schaden und wird mit Warp-Brand belegt. Dieser Angriff hat {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Der Psioniker kann sich bewegen, nachdem er Entzünden eingesetzt hat. Warp-Brand: fügt dem Ziel am Ende seines Zugs {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} Schaden zu, mit {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Die Zielkreatur muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem Malus von −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} bestehen, damit der {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Brand{/g} endet.

languages.text: La cible subit (entre {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} et {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) points de dégâts ainsi que l'effet Combustion Warp. La {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette attaque s'élève à {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} %. Le psyker peut se déplacer après avoir utilisé Enflammer. Combustion Warp : inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son tour, avec {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de Pénétration d'armure. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} pour cesser de se consumer.
languages.original_text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: La cible subit (entre {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} et {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) points de dégâts ainsi que l'effet Combustion Warp. La {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette attaque s'élève à {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} %. Le psyker peut se déplacer après avoir utilisé Enflammer. Combustion Warp : inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son tour, avec {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de Pénétration d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} pour cesser de se {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}consumer{/g}.

La cible subit {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} points de dégâts et est frappée par l'effet Combustion Warp. La {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure {/g} de cette attaque est de {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} %. Combustion Warp : Inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, avec {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de pénétration d'armure. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} pour cesser de se consumer.

La cible subit (entre {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} et {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) points de dégâts ainsi que l'effet Combustion Warp. La {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Pénétration d'armure{/g} de cette attaque s'élève à {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} %. Le psyker peut se déplacer après avoir utilisé Enflammer. Combustion Warp : inflige {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} points de dégâts à la cible à la fin de son tour, avec {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} % de Pénétration d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}. La créature ciblée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} pour cesser de se {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}consumer{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットは({uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}～{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9})のダメージを受け、「ワープの炎」効果を受ける。この攻撃は{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。異能者は、発火を使った後に動くことができる。 ワープの炎：ターゲットのターン終了時に、{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分のアーマー貫通を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、炎上を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}のペナルティを受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。
languages.original_text: The target suffers (from {uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} to {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) damage and suffers the warp burn effect. This attack has {uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. The psyker can move after using Ignite. Warp Burn: deals {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} damage to the target at the end of their turn with {uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}% armour penetration. The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは({uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}～{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9})のダメージを受け、「ワープの炎」効果を受ける。この攻撃は{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。異能者は、発火を使った後に動くことができる。 ワープの炎：ターゲットのターン終了時に、{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}のペナルティを受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。

ターゲットは<{uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}-{uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}のダメージを受け、「ワープの炎」効果を受ける。この攻撃は{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ。 ワープの炎： ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に、{uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}分のダメージを与える。このダメージは{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}%分のアーマー貫通を持つ。ターゲットの生物は、炎上を止めるには−{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けた状態で、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければならない。

languages.text: Hedef, ({uip|BaseDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} ila {uip|MaxDamage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9}) hasar alır ve öte yanığına maruz kalır. Saldırının %{uip|BasePenetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} özelliği bulunur. Ruhsezer, Tutuştur'u kullandıktan sonra hareket edebilir. Öte Yanığı: Hedefe turunun sonunda %{uip|Penetration|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} zırh delme özelliğine sahip {uip|Damage|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} hasar verir. Hedef yaratık, yanmayı durdurmak için −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir.

The target creature must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|a2cca43669184eaa9f0da981f204e1c9} penalty to stop burning.
